Formsite is an online form builder that: Formsite é um construtor de formulários online que lhe permite criar formulários e pesquisas facilmente.
Trigger when a new form result is submit: Ativar quando um novo resultado de formulário for submetido
\n **Enable Basic Authentication:**\n:
**Enable Basic Authentication:**
  1. Login to your Formbricks account
  2. Open the form you want to connect
  3. Change tab to *From Settings* -> *Integrations* -> *Server Post*
  4. Enable *Server Post* and set the URL to the webhook URL generated after you save the trigger.
  ```text
			{{webhookUrl}}
			```
5. Select Message format as *JSON*
6. Save the settings
